chunk_id: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0__chunk_643
source: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0
text:
meconium
o add one mL of amniotic fluid to one mL of 95 per cent alcohol in a clean dry test tube; cover with clean
plastic or plastic top (not rubber)
o shake the tube vigorously for 30 seconds
o tap the side of the tube to get rid of large bubbles
o examine the meniscus (surface) of the fluid mixture 30 seconds after shaking, holding the tube upright
o if at least a thin and complete ring of foam remains on the meniscus, the fetus is likely to have mature
l
ungs and is unlikely to develop hya
